<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fell Rider](/Feats.aspx?ID=2373) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=268" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 35 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
animal companion

</column>

---

You have trained with your animal companion to become a terrifying, unified juggernaut on the battlefield. Your animal companion becomes trained in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7). If your animal companion uses Support while serving as your mount, it grants you the effects of the [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75) reaction on your first Intimidation check to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) on the same turn, even though it can't take reactions.
name: Fell Rider
